title: Resume Website using HTML/CSS
features: Designed and coded a responsive personal portfolio website using HTML5, CSS3, and modern web standards, achieving 95% mobile compatibility and 98% cross-browser consistency.
Integrated multimedia elements (video, icons, imagery) and optimized assets to reduce load times by 30%, enhancing user engagement and SEO performance.
Implemented interactive navigation and smooth scrolling with custom CSS animations, resulting in a 40% increase in average session duration compared to static templates.
